name: Pavanputra Hanuman
description:
Lord Hanuman was able to fly from birth, which was a gift given by his father Vayu Deva. Using his flying power he once tried to snatch sun fruit. In this app characters get special power from Bal Hanuman and fly by avoiding obstacles in the way.

For those who are fan of Flappy Bird this games comes with a lot more than that. You can select characters of both boys and girls and make them fly while chanting "Jai Hanuman" and "Jai Bajrang Bali".

Features of the game.
- Select Flying Characters
- Get Medals on High Score
- Pause and Play games form the middle
- Compete with others and see your score
